tool_description: ### The quickest source of bite-sized knowledge about any phrase.
name: Fast Wiki
title: Fast Wiki

api_list.name: wiki
api_list.description: Get a bite-sized content of knowledge about a queried word phrase.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: a phrase query parameter that should content relate to

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: A lang code formatted as ISO 639-1 code. Default value is `en`
